column5: Congrats on the retirement may it be long and fruitful.
Big congrats 👏 to you enjoy yourself
Yep,Last day at work is 20 Sep. 2022. 40+ years...Leaving for Canada (Wawa, Little Miss) 22 Sep. 2022This will be first time I did NOT have to rush back.
Congrats,good luck at the L miss!
What a great feeling that must be. Congrats on retirement, and have a great trip!

Congratulations on your retirement. Hope you have a great trip. You have already found one of the best parts of the retirement puzzle. I remember the exact morning when I was at our place on Flag Island and realized that there was nothing I had to rush home for!! Great feeling. Tight lines and leave a few for the rest of us. T
Awesome and I’d stay until I run out of bait!
Congratulations and good luck on your trip.
Congratulations! You are doing the same thing I plan to do when I retire. Enjoy it because you’ve earned it.

Congrats! Enjoy a long, healthy, happy retirement! I retired last year myself, and got up to Canada 3 times this past summer. Nothing better!! My plan was always to be done when I turned 60, and I was able to reach that goal with a few months to spare. What did you do for 40 years? That is one long career. Hopefully you have a great report when you get back!
